original: intros a p nZa canon_p. unfold canonical in canon_p. intros x Hx. unfold divpf. destruct (eqA_dec (hd x) a) as [H_eqA | H_eqA]. + rewrite H_eqA. apply canon_p. destruct x. * contradiction. * simpl in Hx. injection Hx as eq_head eq_tail. rewrite <- eq_head. apply (proj2 (zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) nZa). + apply (canon_p (cons (hd x) tl)). * intros H_abs. apply H_eqA. now injection H_abs. * apply (proj2 (Hx (or_introl eq_refl))). * apply (proj1 (Hx (or_introl eq_refl))).
